name: JACKPOT JOURNEY
description:
"A small town dice who wants to work in the big league casinos."

The story follows the main dice who is bored of being a household dice playing the basic board games. The game is a 2D platformer with a dice roll mechanic that enhances your character stats and abilities to get you through the levels but comes with the risk of death.

CREDITS

ART
-Robbie Weston
-Alex Farmer
